messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: PHILADELPHIA POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION DIVISION
Special Victims Unit
SIGNAL: 58P
ITEM NUMBER: P-58090-10
PAGE 7 of 33
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Michael Anderson
Sgt. Diana Brooks
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Thomas Clark
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Richard Evans
Sgt. Elizabeth Harris
( Juvenile Division)
Det. William Taylor
Det. Sophia Martinez
( Juvenile Division)
Det. Kevin Lewis
( Juvenile Division)
Det. Sandra Gonzalez
Det. Josephine Lee
(General Assignment)
Det. Alex Johnson
(Domestic Violence Section)
Det. Marcus Brown
(Sexual Assault Section)
VICTIM:
JANE DOE, female, date of birth 05/22/1987.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
11 NOVEMBER 2010 at approximately 11:15 PM near Broad Street and Snyder Avenue.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Thomas Clark
2910
In the midst of the investigation, multiple accounts emerged from the area. Officer Peterson, on routine patrol, was among the first responders to the scene. Accompanying him were Sgt. Richard Evans and Patrol Officer Jenkins. They managed to secure the vicinity, awaiting further instructions. Technician Bailey, known for her expertise in crime scene analysis, arrived shortly to process the evidence. Criminalist Rodriguez, focusing on the gathered materials, discovered a key piece of evidence that would later prove pivotal in the case. Coroner Dr. Williams was tasked with examining a body found in a nearby lot, initially not connected to the Special Victims Unit case, but later proving vital. Patrol Officer Rivera, interacting with the community, managed to unearth details critical to identifying a suspect.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Michael Anderson Officer Context: Supervising the case in the Special Victims Unit. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Diana Brooks Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Anderson. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Thomas Clark Officer Context: Lead investigator of the case, reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Richard Evans Officer Context: Assisted in the response, part of the Juvenile Division. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Elizabeth Harris Officer Context: Juvenile Division sergeant, supporting the investigation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. William Taylor Officer Context: Juvenile Division detective, contributed to the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Sophia Martinez Officer Context: Assisting in the investigation, Juvenile Division detective. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Kevin Lewis Officer Context: Part of the Juvenile Division, involved in the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Sandra Gonzalez Officer Context: General assignment detective, assisting in the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Josephine Lee Officer Context: General Assignment detective, supported the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Alex Johnson Officer Context: Domestic Violence Section detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Marcus Brown Officer Context: Sexual Assault Section detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Peterson Officer Context: One of the first responders to the scene, on routine patrol. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Jenkins Officer Context: Assisted in securing the vicinity with Sgt. Evans. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Bailey Officer Context: Crime scene analysis expert, processed the evidence. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Rodriguez Officer Context: Focused on gathered materials, discovered key evidence. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Williams Officer Context: Examined body found in nearby lot, connected it to the case. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Rivera Officer Context: Interacted with the community, uncovered critical details. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
